body:
# Components

## Application Security Management (IAST)

* :bug: Fix verify error when ctor params are used after a call site (#9083 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bug: Limit the maximum size of the location path in IAST vulnerabilities (#9028 - @jandro996)
* :bug: Fix IAST gRPC handler with null superclass (#8984 - @smola)
* :sparkles: Optimize IAST Vulnerability Detection (#8885 - @jandro996)

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :sparkles: Upgrade libddwaf-java to 15.0.0 (#9022 - @sezen-datadog)
* :sparkles: Extract RestEasy json body response schemas (#9015 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Extract Jersey json body response schemas (#9014 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Extract Ratpack json body response schemas (#9013 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Enable API Security by default and make it lazy loading (#9009 - @smola)
* :sparkles: Extract Vert.x json body response schemas (#9001 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Extract Play json body response schemas (#8995 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bug: Fix Jackson nodes introspection for request/response schema extraction (#8980 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Extract Spring json body response schemas  (#8938 - @sezen-datadog)
* :sparkles: Default obfuscation regexp update (#8937 - @sezen-datadog)

## Build & Tooling

* :sparkles: Cancel GitLab running pipeline on new PR push (#9023 - @PerfectSlayer)
* :sparkles: Migrate publishing to Maven Central Portal (#8807 - @sarahchen6)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :bug: Fix Test Optimization to work with JDK 24 (#9114 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Add repo root as safe directory on git client creation (#9033 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add PR number tag and improve PR information building (#8990 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Update impacted tests logic (#8923 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :broom: Clean up DSM context injection (#8776 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Database Monitoring

* :bug: Set trace_injected in try block (#9025 - @natashadada)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :bug: Add source file tracking enable option (#9115 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add java.util.Date support (#9111 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Update file probe format (#9047 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: add safe local var hoisting (#9034 - @jpbempel)
* :broom: Add new config for debugger upload interval (#8959 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Enable Code Origin with Dynamic instrumentation (#8940 - @jpbempel)

## ML Observability (LLMObs)

* :bulb: LLM Observability SDK (#8781 - @gary-huang, @nayeem-kamal)

## Metrics

* :bug: Ensure client stat reporter is started when the agent is not available at bootstrap (#9082 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Create metric: appsec.waf.config_errors (#8394 - @sezen-datadog)

## Platform components

* :sparkles: Introduce environment component (#9071 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Profiling

* :bug: Remove annoying warning for smap event parsing (#9119 - @jbachorik)
* :bug: Fix ByteCountingInputStream when reading past EOF (#8988 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Realtime User Monitoring

* :sparkles: Add RUM SDK injection for servlet based web servers (#9110 - @PerfectSlayer @amarziali)

## Telemetry

* :sparkles: Update the config origin metric to match what it's mapping (#9045 - @sezen-datadog)

## Testing

* :sparkles: Add testing for latest stable version (JDK 24) (#8875 - @sarahchen6)

## Trace context propagation

* :bug: Fix bug with dropping baggage when `TracePropagationBehaviorExtract=IGNORE` (#9037 - @mhlidd)
* :bug: Fix ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in PercentEscaper (#9032 - @mhlidd)

## Tracer core

* :bug: Fix `Error` handling for trace interceptors (#9097 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :bulb: Add wildcard feature for `DD_TRACE_HEADER_TAGS` and enabling for Http Response headers (#9067 - @mhlidd)

## Tracer public API

* :bulb: Add LLM Observability SDK (#8781 - @gary-huang)

# Instrumentations

## Akka instrumentation

* :bug: Fix NPE in akka-http and pekko-http integrations (#9019 - @mcculls)

## Eclipse Vert.x instrumentation

* :sparkles: Extract Vert.x json body response schemas (#9001 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Write http.route tag as soon as possible in vert.x (#8952 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## JAX-WS instrumentation

* :bulb::warning: Enable jax-ws integration by default (#9030 - @bm1549)
* :sparkles: Extract Jersey json body response schemas (#9014 - @jandro996)

## Mule instrumentation

* :bug: Propagate grizzly http span in filters if nothing is active (#9016 - @amarziali)

## Play Framework instrumentation

* :sparkles: Extract Play json body response schemas (#8995 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Ratpack instrumentation

* :sparkles: Extract Ratpack json body response schemas (#9013 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Spring instrumentation

* :sparkles: Extract Spring json body response schemas  (#8938 - @sezen-datadog)
